method.name: GET
method.doc:
Lists all videos that have the specified tag.
More at: http://youtube.com/dev_api_ref?m=youtube.videos.list_by_tag

param.name: method
param.doc: Read-only. Indicates that the method is youtube.videos.list_by_tag.

param.name: dev_id
param.doc: Your developer ID. If you don't have one, you can request one here: http://youtube.com/my_profile_dev

param.name: page
param.doc: Optional. The "page number" of results you want to retrieve: 1, 2, 3, etc.

param.name: per_page
param.doc: Optional. The number of results you want to retrieve per page. Default is 20, maximum is 100.

method.name: GET
method.doc:
Lists the most recent 25 videos that have been featured on the front page of the YouTube site.
More at: http://youtube.com/dev_api_ref?m=youtube.videos.list_featured

param.name: method
param.doc: Read-only. Indicates that the method is youtube.videos.list_featured.

param.name: dev_id
param.doc: Your developer ID. If you don't have one, you can request one here: http://youtube.com/my_profile_dev

method.name: GET
method.doc:
Lists the most popular videos in the specified time range.
More at: http://youtube.com/dev_api_ref?m=youtube.videos.list_popular

param.name: method
param.doc: Read-only. Indicates that the method is youtube.videos.list_popular.

param.name: dev_id
param.doc: Your developer ID. If you don't have one, you can request one here: http://youtube.com/my_profile_dev

param.name: time_range
param.doc: The period of time to evaluate for the most popular videos. Values can be day, week, month, all.

method.name: GET
method.doc:
Displays the details for a video.
More at: http://youtube.com/dev_api_ref?m=youtube.videos.getDetails

param.name: method
param.doc: Read-only. Indicates that the method is youtube.videos.getDetails.

param.name: dev_id
param.doc: Your developer ID. If you don't have one, you can request one here: http://youtube.com/my_profile_dev

param.name: video_id
param.doc: The ID of the video to get details for. You can get an ID by calling one of the supported slist APIs, like listPopular, listFeatured, or listByTag.
